about_the_game:
Welcome to Azazel Gamble: The Ultimate Fate Gamble!

Step into Azazel Gamble, an intense psychological battle where conspiracy, betrayal, and the stakes of fate are in play. Here, there is no absolute friendship, only life-or-death challenges. You and three other players sit at the table, but one of you hides a demonic identity—Azazel. This game not only tests your intelligence and strategy but also challenges your courage and skills in deception.

Gameplay: One Mode Available, More to Come!

Fate Roulette: Find Azazel

At the beginning of the game, you and three other players will each receive two cards—one of which is the Azazel card. However, no one knows who Azazel is. Azazel will secretly hide their identity and disguise as an ordinary player. Through words, actions, and even the smallest details, you must carefully observe others to see if they are lying and uncover the hidden demon. At the end, you must raise your gun and kill the demon, or face being killed by Azazel.

Why You’ll Love Azazel Gamble

  • Engaging Multiplayer Online Experience
    Every match is full of suspense, filled with the clash of wit and courage as you battle to survive.

  • Thrilling Experience of Lies and Deception
    You can lie, or expose the lies of others, but in the end, only one player will survive.

  • Regular Updates with New Characters and Gameplay
    We constantly bring new challenges and updates to keep the experience fresh and exciting for players.

  • Immersive, Thrilling Atmosphere
    The game’s environment and sound design will transport you into a terrifying world, making every twist and confrontation filled with tension.

Are You Ready for the Challenge?

In Azazel Gamble, every choice could mean the difference between life and death. Everyone is playing for their life—can you break the curse of fate and escape alive? Join us, uncover the secrets hidden behind each player, and push your limits to the edge!

Follow Us
Stay connected through social media to get the latest game information and exclusive previews. Don’t miss out on any of the thrilling action!

short_description: Whoever commits evil shall perish in their own iniquity. When the Angel of Death—Azazel—descends, the gamble of fate has already begun. Kill Azazel, or be slain by Him entirely. Among the four, only one can leave alive. You have no choice but to trust yourself.
